    • Method Detail

      • build

        public String build(YADAQuery yq)
             throws YADAAdaptorException
        Sets soap request authentication, action, connection, and request metadata.
        Overrides:
        build in class Adaptor
        Parameters:
        yq - the YADAQuery containing the source code and metadata required to construct an executable query
        Returns:
        SOAP request source and path
        Throws:
        YADAAdaptorException - when the stored SOAP query specs cannot be parsed into a SOAP message

      • execute

        public void execute(YADAQuery yq)
             throws YADAAdaptorExecutionException
        Constructs and executes a SOAP message. For basic authentication, YADA uses the java soap api, and the SOAPConnection object stored in the query object. For NTLM, which was never successful using the java api, YADA calls out to CURL_EXEC in YADA_BIN.
        Overrides:
        execute in class Adaptor
        Parameters:
        yq - the YADAQuery containing the code to execute
        Throws:
        YADAAdaptorExecutionException - if exception is thrown during query execution
        See Also:
        Adaptor.execute(com.novartis.opensource.yada.YADAQuery)
